Label: Purpose
Member Of: To link items that are part of a collection.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Member Of: Make a collection record to group records together. Enter the ID of the collection-level record.

Label: Commentary
Member Of: This is one of several fields that describe how records relate to each other. To link to a book or atlas (rather than a collection), see [Is Part Of](../ogm-aardvark/#is-part-of).
